channel.title: book-review on João Duarte
channel.description: Recent content in book-review on João Duarte

item.title: Essentialism: The disciplined pursuit of less.
item.description: I bought this book in 2015 at the MIT Coop, a bookstore/cooperative founded at Harvard in 1882, and which continues to serve Harvard and MIT students to this day. Since then, I believe I have read this book about 4 or 5 times. And it has helped me a lot each time. I have a curious mind that wants to learn a little bit of everything. I don’t have an essentialist spirit, but I have a great admiration for those who have that focus and discipline.
